description.title: About
description.descriptions: SAP Marketing Cloud solutions enable your organization to orchestrate personalized customer engagements, gain visibility and control of the entire closed-loop marketing process, and make data-driven decisions to increase marketing ROI.

bullets.text: Deep linking in Mobile Push Notification for direct mobile app users for in moment marketing
Account Based Reports for X+O Data
Increased Campaign Flexibility by designing end-to-end campaign flows with the flexibility to split & merge campaign branches
New Segmentation Builder (Restricted use only with 1911) provides segmentation UI integrated into the Fiori Launchpad
New Email Editor to create emails easily
SAP Commerce Clickstream Tracking combines the power of SAP Context-Driven Services and SAP Marketing Cloud for deeper customer insights and to drive omnichannel personalization
Inbox Preview with Litmus* (*Requires additional partner license)
